content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to generate an image and get a text summary of the Wikipedia page about octopuses. The summary included information about their anatomy, physiology, behavior, ecology, and evolution, as well as their physical characteristics, behavior, habitat, and commercial use, different species, distribution, and classification, cultural significance, representation in art and mythology, and ethical concerns surrounding their use in scientific research and commercial fishing. I also received a command to google "octopus-inspired technology in robotics," which returned several articles about robotic arms and underwater robots inspired by octopuses.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/octopus-inspired-robots-silicone-skin-can-change-texture-for-3-d-camouflage/", "question": "What interesting information can we find on this website about octopus-inspired technology in robotics?"}}}'}]
"""
